verses.verse: And in that day<WH3117> you shall say<WH559>, O Lord<WH3068>, I will praise<WH3034> you<WH599>: though you were angry with me<WH639>, your anger is turned away<WH7725>, and you comforted me<WH5162>.

Behold<WH410>, God is my salvation<WH3444>; I will trust<WH982>, and not be afraid<WH6342>: for the Lord<WH3050> Jehovah<WH3068> is my strength<WH5797> and my song<WH2176>; he also is become my salvation<WH3444>.
Therefore with joy<WH8342> shall you draw<WH7579> water<WH4325> out of the wells<WH4599> of salvation<WH3444>.

And in that day<WH3117> shall you say<WH559>, Praise<WH3034> the Lord<WH3068>, call<WH7121> upon his name<WH8034>, declare<WH3045> his doings<WH5949> among the people<WH5971>, make mention<WH2142> that his name<WH8034> is exalted<WH7682>.
Sing<WH2167> unto the Lord<WH3068>; for he has done<WH6213> excellent things<WH1348>: this is known<WH3045> in all the earth<WH776>.
Cry out<WH6670> and shout<WH7442>, you inhabitant<WH3427> of Zion<WH6726>: for great<WH1419> is the Holy One<WH6918> of Israel<WH3478> in the midst of you<WH7130>.
